title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama - Kamen Kokuhaku Taikai
original_name: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ 仮面告白大会 第 1 週来場者特典 ピクチャードラマ
sinopse: A picture drama bonus included in a special DVD given to all who purchased a ticket for the film Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch I - Koudou over the course of the first six weeks of airing.
